thread.title: Actress Noree Victoria to Greet Fans @ Premiere of “A Place in Hell” During Philadelphia Independent Film Festival
thread.title_full: Actress Noree Victoria to Greet Fans @ Premiere of “A Place in Hell” During Philadelphia Independent Film Festival

author: Robin Beaman
title: Actress Noree Victoria to Greet Fans @ Premiere of “A Place in Hell” During Philadelphia Independent Film Festival
text:
Contact: Devon M. Allen, (267) 258-6861, Devon(dot)Allen(at)verizon(dot)net MEDIA ADVISORY
Actress Noree Victoria to Greet Fans @ Premiere of “A Place in Hell” During Philadelphia Independent Film Festival
A nearly sold-out screening of the much anticipated psychological thriller, “A Place in Hell”, will draw audiences near and far for a special premiere and Q&A with the director and cast at the Philadelphia Independent Film Festival.
Written and directed by David Boorboor, and starring Lewis Smith and Noree Victoria, ‘A Place in Hell’ was inspired by real-life serial killer Harrison Graham, reimagined as Harrison Graves, who stalks and slays college filmmakers shooting a movie at a haunted local attraction.
Feel free to view the link to the trailer: https://vimeo.com/109543892 . Limited tickets are available for purchase online: http://piff.ticketmob.com/event.cfm?cart&showTimingID=116338 .
Connect with Noree (@noreevictoria) via social media on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.
WHO: Actress Noree Victoria & Philadelphia Independent Film Festival
WHAT: Film Screening Premiere – “A Place in Hell”
WHERE: The University of the Arts, Levitt Theater, 401 South Broad Street, Philadelphia, PA
WHEN: Sunday, October 25, 2015 @ 4:00 p.m.
###
